file.name: file_openapi.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    SystemsV1File:
      type: object
    SystemsV1FileCreateOption:
      properties:
        data:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        size:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      type: object
    SystemsV1FileDeleteOption:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
      type: object
    SystemsV1FileList:
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
      type: object
    SystemsV1FileUpdateOption:
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
      type: object
info:
  description: systems.v1
  title: systems.v1
  version: "1"
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /systems/file:
    put:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SystemsV1FileUpdateOption'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SystemsV1File'
          description: ok
      tags:
      - systems.v1.FileService
    summary: Update
  /systems/file/{id}:
    delete:
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SystemsV1File'
          description: ok
      tags:
      - systems.v1.FileService
    summary: Delete
tags:
- name: systems.v1.FileService
